trust_building: Arre, wait wait... I don't understand this properly. Can you explain slowly?
My son always tells me to be careful with these things. Is this genuine or what?
How did you get my number? I never gave it to anyone.
Sir, I'm not very good with all these online things. You have to guide me step by step.
This sounds too good to be true. My neighbor got cheated last month only.
Can I call you back after talking to my family? They know better than me.
I saw on TV that lot of fraud is happening these days. How do I trust you?
What is your company name? Let me Google it first.
Do you have any office I can visit? I prefer doing things in person.
My daughter-in-law handles all this. Can you call in the evening when she's home?
I'm retired person, don't have much money. Are you sure this is for me?
Sir, speak in Hindi/Tamil na, English is difficult for me.
How long will this take? I have to go for my doctor appointment.
Can you send me something in writing? WhatsApp message or email?
Is this government approved scheme or private company?
information_gathering: Okay okay, I'm interested. But first tell me - is it 100% safe?
So I just have to pay ₹500 and I'll get ₹50,000? That's all?
Which bank account should I use? I have two - SBI and Canara Bank.
Do I need to go to bank or can I do from home only?
My phone is very old, sometimes apps don't work properly. What if payment fails?
Can I pay half now and half later? ₹500 is lot of money for me.
You mentioned some documents needed. I don't know how to scan and send.
What is this UPI ID you're giving? Looks like personal number, not company.
Why can't I pay directly to company account? This seems suspicious.
How many people have already taken this? Can you give me their contact to verify?
extraction: Okay fine, I'll do it. Send me that UPI ID again, let me write it down.
My hand is shaking, can't write properly. Spell it slowly - one letter at a time.
Is it V for Victor or B for Bravo? I'm getting confused.
After I send money to this UPI, what is next step?
You said ₹500 but app is showing ₹600. Should I still pay?

trust_building: Whoa, this is amazing! How did I get selected for this?
Bro, this is legit na? Not some scam or prank?
My friends will be so jealous! Can I post about this on Instagram?
OMG ₹50,000! That's like 3 months of my pocket money!
Dude, explain the full process. I'm totally in if it's real.
Will this affect my credit score or anything? I'm planning to take loan next year.
Is there age limit? I just turned 21 last month.
Can I do this multiple times or just once?
This sounds like those YouTube ads. Is it actually working for people?
Bhai, I'm a student, don't have much money. ₹500 is my one week food expenses.
information_gathering: Okay cool, I'm convinced. So I just UPI you ₹500 and done?
Which UPI app works best - PhonePe, GPay or Paytm?
Bro, this UPI ID looks like personal number. Your company doesn't have business account?
Can I pay via credit card? I'll get cashback also then.
After payment, how fast is the processing? I need money by this weekend.
Is there any referral bonus? I can get 10-15 people easily.
What's your company Instagram handle? Want to check reviews.
You said guaranteed money. So if I don't get, you'll refund my ₹500?
Bro, explain once more. I want to make YouTube video about this for my channel.
The website looks bit cheap yaar. Don't you guys have budget for better design?
extraction: Done bro, I'm ready. Send me payment details - UPI, QR code, whatever.
Writing down your UPI ID... Can you spell it once more slowly?
Bro, autocorrect is changing the ID. Is it 'winner' or 'winer' with one 'n'?
Should I add remark in payment? Like 'Registration fee' or something?
₹500 flat or with GST? Just confirming before paying.

trust_building: Interesting call. Let me guess - you got my number from some data leak?
Bro, I work in tech. I know how these scams work.
Before we proceed, can you verify you're calling from legitimate organization?
What's your company's API documentation look like? I want to integrate.
Let me run a quick Truecaller check on your number. Hold on.
information_gathering: Okay, I'll bite. But I'm using VPN and throwaway email first.
What payment gateway are you using? Razorpay? Paytm? Instamojo?
Why UPI and not proper payment gateway with merchant protection?
Can I see your merchant ID? Should be available if you're legitimate.
What's your refund policy API endpoint? I want to test it.
extraction: Alright, I'll test this. But I'm using virtual card with ₹600 limit.
Sending payment. But I'm running Wireshark to monitor traffic.
Your UPI handle looks generated. firstname.lastname pattern. Script?
I'm logging this entire transaction. Hope you know that.
Can you share transaction hash? I want to verify on blockchain.

My hands are trembling, eyes are weak. Can you talk to my son?
I'm 68 years old. These phone calls scare me.

I only know how to receive calls. Don't know these apps and all.
information_gathering: Okay beta, I'll try. But you have to help me step by step.
Which button to press? This smartphone has so many icons.
I don't know password of my phone. My daughter set it up.

Beta, my fingers are not working properly on touchscreen.
extraction: Beta, you spell the UPI ID. I'll write on paper first.
Is it capital letter or small letter? I don't know.
@ symbol - where is it on keyboard? I can't find.
Beta, I wrote wrong. Can you start from beginning?

urgency_response: Why so much hurry? Genuine offers don't expire in 1 hour.
You're creating pressure. That's tactic #1 in scam handbook.
I need time to think. If you can't wait, not interested.
Limited time offer? I've heard this before.
Stop rushing me. I'll decide when I'm ready.
otp_request: Why do you need OTP? That's for me to enter, not share.
My bank clearly says never share OTP with anyone.
If you're from bank, you should already have access. Why asking me?
OTP is one-time password. It's called PASSWORD for a reason.
I saw on TV - sharing OTP means losing all money.
phishing_link: Why does link open and close immediately? Looks like phishing.
Your link is redirecting multiple times. Very suspicious.
This website has no contact information. Red flag.
I don't see any About Us page. Who runs this?
Website looks made in 10 minutes using template.
technical_issues: My phone is hanging. Let me restart and call you back.
App crashed. Installing again. Will take 10-15 minutes.
I'm getting 'server error'. Is your system down?
Payment gateway timing out. Your side issue or mine?
My internet pack expired. Let me recharge first.
